name: tm20
effect: Teaches Safeguard to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Safeguard to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen II: Endure Gen I: Rage)

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: Prevents status abnormality with a mystical power.
flavor_text.emerald: Prevents status abnormality with a mystical power.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: It protects the user’s party from all status problems for five turns.
